item.title: My husband and I have been married for 18 years. We share a son — and my husband has a daughter. Why should they get an equal inheritance?
item.description: “This year she got married, and I was completely left out of any planning, bridal-shower and wedding activities.”

item.title: Dell expected to provide lower guidance next week, but AI servers remain a big bright spot
item.description: Here’s why one analyst advises, “Don’t bet against Michael Dell.”

item.title: SPACs are back with a vengeance. What could possibly go wrong?

item.title: ‘I have fear of financial insecurity’: I’m 58, recently widowed with $1 million saved for retirement. What if the economy tanks?
item.description: “My pension after taxes is estimated at $6,500 per month. I’m eligible at age 60 to access $2,400 per month of my husband’s Social Security.”

item.title: Medtronic’s stock falls on inventory hiccup and revenue miss
item.description: Medtronic said it is “starting to see the results” of its investment in new products.
